footer.address: Address: Moscow region, Leninsky urban district, Aparinki village, property 9, building 1, room 3

aboutSection.title: Briefly about us:
aboutSection.desc: GoldenFlowers Cash&Carry has been a supplier of flowers, plants and accessories from leading global manufacturers to the Russian market for decades and one of the largest wholesale bases for the flower business in the Moscow region. We have wholesale sales of cut flowers, potted plants, packaging materials. Here you will find everything for the flower business!

collectionSection.title: Only fresh flowers and plants from fertile soil
collectionSection.desc: In addition, the warehouse always has products for plant care: soil and soil mixtures, mineral and organic fertilizers, top dressing at wholesale prices. For owners of flower shops and florists, a large assortment of accessories for creating bouquets is presented.

supplierSection.title: We import products from all continents of the world
supplierSection.desc: We supply flowers, plants and accessories from Holland, Italy, Germany, Spain, Israel, USA, China, Turkey, Azerbaijan, Armenia, Ecuador, Costa Rica, Colombia, Ethiopia, Uganda, Kenya and others.

header.title: We are the largest flower base in the region!
header.desc: GoldenFlowers Cash&Carry has been a supplier of flowers, plants and accessories from leading global manufacturers to the Russian market for decades and one of the largest wholesale bases for the flower business in the Moscow region. Here you will find everything for the flower businness. We supply flowers, plants and accessories from Holland, Italy, Germany, Spain, Israel, USA, China, Turkey, Azerbaijan, Armenia, Ecuador, Costa Rica, Colombia, Ethiopia, Uganda, Kenya and others. In addition, the warehouse always has products for plant care: soil and soil mixtures, mineral and organic fertilizers, top dressing at wholesale prices. For owners of flower shops and florists, a large assortment of accessories for creating bouquets is presented.

sectionMain.caution: Dear guests and clients! We try to show the showcase without violating confidentiality. Also, pay attention to the time and date of publication of the showcase photos from CCTV cameras. The assortment can change every hour. For detailed information, call us.
